review: It works well if you have amazon prime, however be prepared to buy stock in energizer...I have had it for a week and am on my third set of AAA Batteries for the remote.  Plus it is not very portable.  Would have gone with the fire stick if I had to do it over so I could take it into the other room with me if my wife wanted to watch regular tv.

review: I love this little box. I had my cable box removed and have never looked back. There does seem to be a small hic-cup, some of the apps such as History Channel (H2) requires you to "register" to see several of the videos, but, when I try to register it shows "Amazon Fire TV" but then it asks for my provider and Amazon is not listed. I no longer use a cable tv provider only for internet.
